name: Binary Reactor
description:
React to the change in binary as fast as you can!

There's a bunch of '0' buttons. Don't click them. Instead, click the '1' button when it appears, as fast as you can! If you miss, you step one life closer to a game over.

Binary Reactor was made in < 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #58.
Theme: "0 buttons".
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments. Thanks for playing!
